item.title: Report X-2023080270
item.description:
Report X-2023080270

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-23T18:12:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-25
  • City: DUBUQUE
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: unload personnel identified a wet hazmat package while unload process. package was taken to hazmat cage for processing. DescribePack: caps were not tight leading to contents to leak DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was segregated from unload area and moved to hazmat cage

item.title: Report X-2023080268

  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: unload personnel identified a wet hazmat package while unloading trailer. Packages were taken to hazmat cage for processing. DescribePack: Caps were not tight leading contents to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was removed from unload area and taken to hazmat processing cage
